data.name: Attack on Titan - Mikasa Costume - Summer Festival
data.detailed_description:
Give Mikasa a new outfit.
Add a little flavor to the battlefield by wearing a costume with a Summer motif.

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
data.about_the_game:
Give Mikasa a new outfit.
Add a little flavor to the battlefield by wearing a costume with a Summer motif.

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
data.short_description: Give Mikasa a new outfit. Add a little flavor to the battlefield by wearing a costume with a Summer motif.

fullgame.name: Attack on Titan / A.O.T. Wings of Freedom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Core i7 870 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Pixel Shader 3.0 over 3D Accelerator chip , VRAM 1GB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Pixel Shader 3.0 over 3D Accelerator chip , VRAM 2GB over
